text: Porsgrunn is a city and a municipality in Telemark County in South-Eastern Norway. The city is divided into two parts by the river Skienselva. There is also a big industrial island called Herøya which is the back bone for the city. == History == ['Porsgrunn porcelain factory' or] "Porsgrund porselænsfabrik" was established in 1885. The factory has been turned into a small shopping center with a gym and thousands of squarefeet of office spaces. Area: 161 km2 Population: 36224 ==Related pages== *List of mayors in Norway that are elected until 2027 == References == Category:Cities in Norway Category:Municipalities of Telemark
title: Porsgrunn
